body_html: This is an issue with most of the distributions, unfortunately. The issue is that sphinx renders the default arguments as it appears in the __repr__. One way to fix this is by modifying __repr__ for the constraints. I'll send in a patch.
body_text: This is an issue with most of the distributions, unfortunately. The issue is that sphinx renders the default arguments as it appears in the __repr__. One way to fix this is by modifying __repr__ for the constraints. I'll send in a patch.
body: This is an issue with most of the distributions, unfortunately. The issue is that `sphinx` renders the default arguments as it appears in the `__repr__`. One way to fix this is by modifying `__repr__` for the constraints. I'll send in a patch.
